name: FluentC – AI-Powered Multilingual Website Translaton
author: FluentC

sections.description:
Limited Time Offer: One Free Language for all sites!
FluentC revolutionizes WordPress translation with its AI-powered, user-friendly approach. Designed for simplicity and efficiency, FluentC offers automatic translations that are both quick and accurate, making your WordPress site multilingual without the technical hassle.
Key Features:

AI-powered translations for over 130 languages
Flat-fee pricing: $25/month per language with unlimited translations
SEO-optimized translations to boost your multilingual search rankings
No performance impact on your WordPress site
Easy setup and minimal configuration required

FluentC for WooCommerce
Seamlessly translate your WooCommerce store:

Automatic translation of WooCommerce pages, product categories, and attributes
Product metadata synchronization
Compatible with popular WooCommerce extensions

FluentC for Blocks
Direct support for WordPress block editor:

Translate core blocks including template parts, headings, buttons, and more
Enhanced compatibility with block-enabled themes

External Service Integration

FluentC uses an external JavaScript file (https://widget.fluentc.io/fluentcWidgetWordpress.min.js) to provide advanced features and ensure optimal performance. This approach allows for seamless updates and enhanced functionality without impacting your WordPress hosting environment.
sections.installation:
Install the plugin from the WordPress plugin directory
Activate the plugin
Go to FluentC Settings in your WordPress dashboard
Sign up for a FluentC account and enter your API key
Choose your target languages and configure display settings
Add the FluentC widget to your site using
sections.faq:
How does FluentC compare to other translation plugins?

FluentC offers:

Unlimited translations at a flat monthly fee
No impact on site performance
AI-powered translations for accuracy
Easy setup and management
SEO optimization for multilingual sites

Is FluentC compatible with my theme and plugins?

FluentC is designed to work with most WordPress themes and plugins, including WooCommerce and popular page builders.

How does FluentC handle content updates?

FluentC automatically detects and translates new or updated content, keeping all language versions in sync.

Is there a limit to how much content I can translate?

No, FluentC offers unlimited translations within your subscription.
For more FAQs and support, visit FluentC Support.
